title: CCC
description: A React site created for the Creating Coding Careers, a non-profit in San Diego. I contributed the design and layout, created the wireframe, the responsive navigation bar, the SVG images that serve as transitions between sections, the mobile vs. web sizing and formatrting, and accessabilty.

title: Hacker News
description: A React/hooks site using the Hacker News API to build a basic custom Hacker News reader. It uses async/await and promise.all to handle the async calls and Sass(scss) to do the styling.

title: To Do
description: A React to-do app. It uses Bootstrap

title: YLD
description: A login portal for Yellow Line Digtial Marketing. As a team we implimented single sign on through One-Login, Loopback and MongoDB. After implimenting the new login we migrated the full functionality of their customer facing site ensuring all functionality. I ensured that with a successful login pertanent customer or admin information is passed from server to client side for user dependant site rendering and adjusted role based permissions to allow only admins to create and delete users.

title: Hair
description: A static display site for Hairstylist Sarah Vaughan. It has links to her booking platforn, imbeded maps, photos of her work and descriptions of her services. It is mobile responsive using Sass, media queries and flex-box.

title: Weather
description: A React/Redux/Bootstrap weather app. It hits the Open Weather API and allows the user to search by city for weather information. It locally caches the search history.
